Take on the $BTC or USD debate:

I) Many traders/investors want more Bitcoin

II) Most traders/investors sell BTC to get USD if they're cashing out

Altcoins are a means to getting more BTC.

If you took an altcoin trade, and didn't end up with more BTC, you've failed.

Simple.
